item.title: The Absurdity of Life
item.description: Life is strange and full of surprises. At times, situations can be confusing and the harder we try to comprehend them, the more contradictory they appear. Either things go wrong or luck is not on your side. You and I aren’t the only ones, a lot of philosophers and thinkers have thought about it for generations.
